summary: Aspiring Software Engineer with a background in Electronics and Communication Engineering and strong proficiency in C++, Python, Machine Learning(ML) and full-stack development. Experienced in data structures, algorithms, and building scalable systems using React, Node.js, TensorFlow, and OpenCV.

education.institution: Malaviya National Institute of Technology Jaipur
ANA Convent Higher Secondary School, Indore

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a responsive personal portfolio using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, later enhanced with React and Redux for component-based architecture and state management. Integrated a Node.js and Express backend to handle contact form submissions, with features like smooth scrolling, animations, and mobile responsiveness.

projects.title: Advanced Driver Assistance System
projects.description: Processed 100+ real-world road images achieving 92% lane detection accuracy with Canny Edge + Hough Transform, lane departure warnings triggered with 95% precision, reducing false alarms by 40%. Simulated PID-based Adaptive Cruise Control maintaining safe following distance within ±0.2m error; A-star path planning reduced average route length by 10.2% and path computation time by 50% over BFS.

projects.title: OS Scheduling Algorithm
projects.description: Implemented and benchmarked a novel CPU scheduling algorithm(DNPFS) in C combining burst time prediction, fairness scoring, and multi-level queue priority to optimize process execution and reduce wait time. Achieved 22% lower average turnaround time and 18% fewer context switches, 98% CPU utilization, 15% faster run compared to Round Robin, Multilevel Queue schedulers, FCFS.

experience.details: Successfully organized 24Hr Hackathon as part of the Sphinx 2024 Flagship Event(The Largest Techno-Management Fest in Rajasthan) with 700+ teams registrations.

experience.position: Member of Ideation and Event Management team
experience.details: Core Team member of Sphinx 2023 techno-management fest

achievements: Ranked among the top 0.9% in Jee Mains Exam given by 1 million candidates
